etymology.interpretation: The combination of 阴(陰) (yīn, "concealed") and 道(道) (dào, "path") is a literal description of the vagina as a hidden or internal passage within the body.

examples.chinese: 医生解释说(醫生解釋說)，阴道是女性生殖系统的一部分(陰道是女性生殖系統的一部分)。
examples.pinyin: Yīshēng jiěshì shuō, yīndào shì nǚxìng shēngzhí xìtǒng de yībùfen.
examples.english: The doctor explained that the vagina is part of the female reproductive system.

examples.chinese: 正确理解阴道健康(正確理解陰道健康)，很重要(很重要)。
examples.pinyin: Zhèngquè lǐjiě yīndào jiànkāng, hěn zhòngyào.
examples.english: Understanding vaginal health correctly is important.

examples.chinese: 在体检中(在體檢中)，医生会检查阴道(醫生會檢查陰道)。
examples.pinyin: Zài tǐjiǎn zhōng, yīshēng huì jiǎnchá yīndào.
examples.english: During a physical examination, the doctor will examine the vagina.
